availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Shepard S. Newman (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, master tobacconist.)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, master tobacconist. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Newman. Father of Ellen Newman, Mary Newman, Robert Newman, Theodore Newman, Charles Newman, John Newman, Winfield Newman, Clara Newman, and George Newman. Tobacconist in Covington in 1850. Master tobacconist in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 221B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 183.
Find A Grave, "Shepard S. Newman (1818-1874)," Memorial #52876858, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/52876858 (accessed November 15, 2018).
